name: Panda Kung Fu Fighting: Cute Multiplayer Match 3 Game for Boys & Girls
name_original: Panda Kung Fu Fighting: Cute Multiplayer Match 3 Game for Boys & Girls
description:
t’s time to take a walk on the wild side with this epic match-three multiplayer game.

Panda Kung Fu Fighting. All Action, No Talk.*

Which of the 7 adorable panda will you be?

Panda Kung Fu Fighting takes all the fun you love from match-three games and throws a little competition into the mix. The result is a fast-paced match-three multiplayer game you can play with people around the world.

Who is the king of the pandas now? Only time will tell.

Put your skills to the test! Match pandas to rack up Attack and Defense points during each of the five rounds, and see who is victorious at the end of the battle.

+ Hours of addictive gameplay
+ Available exclusively for iOS
+ Cute pandas theme and artwork
+ Universal support for iPad, iPhone, and iPod
+ Game Center leaderboards
+ In-depth tutorial to show you exactly how to play
+ 5 epic rounds in each battle
+ Special power-ups for each character
+ Groovy soundtrack
+ Make multiple matches per second
+ Share scores to Facebook
+ Unlock new characters and costumes

Addictive gameplay, beautiful retina graphics, and fast-paced battles — what more could you ask for?

Panda Kung Fu Fighting is free, so download it today
